content.text: In the weekend, we went to Mount Takao with our friends.
Huge throngs gathered at the Takao Yamaguchi station and there were lots of autumn colors and ginkgo trees.
We toke chairlifts up to a place neat to top. Then, we walked and enjoyed glamorous scenery.
We also dropped by a temple and prayed.
After hiking for a while, we arrived at the top and took a picture.
Although there was packed with people, the scenery was charming.

title: Nogata Hope Ramen - 1st Experience
introduction: A feast after a leisurely amble at Kichijoji

content.text: We went to Kichijoji on the spur of the moment today.
While shopping, we stopped by a ramen shop named Nogata Hope.
We ordered a bowl of tonkotsu ramen and a bowl of gyokai ramen.
No matter which one we ate, they were so rich.
These ramens made us couldn't help but salivate. We finished in an instance.
Words failed us when we ate these delicious ramens.
We also ordered a dish of quail eggs and a dish of 3 choices of barbecued pork. It looked high-class when we tasted them with wasabi and soy sauce.
It it's possible, why not give it a try.
